name: Blandscapes
description:
Bland
adjective
Lacking strong features or characteristics and therefore uninteresting.

Landscape
noun
All the visible features of an area of land, often considered in terms of their aesthetic appeal.

This exhibition of Blandscapes was created at the Isle of Games retreat at Laxahvammur, North Iceland, over a span of a weekend.

Isle of Games is an art game collective founded in 2017. The collective consists of a diverse group of people all with the common goal of making and exhibiting video games and their extended family in Iceland in collaboration with local poets, novelists, musicians, and artists of all kinds.
